mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Thanks Price for his communications of December 9 and 15; returns the letter Price forwarded to him; it was the first information we received that shipments in English and Spanish vessels for [Baton Rouge] were actually preparing; aware that it might take place, however, orders had been given both on the river and lake which will prevent their success.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1808 December 24, Washington [D.C.] to Chandler Price, n.p.
